definition: one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: The paint on the door is still tacky.
sentences.chinese: 門上的油漆還沒有乾透。

sentences.english: You should let the wood dry out.
Allow the soil to dry slightly between waterings.
sentences.chinese: 土壤稍微乾透後再次澆水。

sentences.english: Once the fabric has completely dried, trim the edges and cut into your desired shape.
sentences.chinese: 等布片乾透後，修剪布邊，剪成你想要的形狀。

sentences.english: The pots are in the drying process.
The water is scarce and it is too dry here, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 這裏都快乾透了，太缺水了。

sentences.english: Apply the mask to your skin and let it dry for 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 將此面膜塗抹在皮膚上，靜待20分鐘，讓其乾透。

sentences.english: The tea is ready when the outside of the pot is dry.
sentences.chinese: 當罐子外面乾透的時候，茶就泡好了。

sentences.english: Dye eggs desired colors and let dry completely.
sentences.chinese: 把雞蛋浸染在喜歡的顏色裏，然後等其完全乾透。

sentences.english: When the paste is scraped off and the cloth gets thoroughly dried, the material is ready for painting.
sentences.chinese: 颳去漿糊以後，布乾透了，就可以開始畫了。

sentences.english: These four large catalogue still lifes were painted this year-I hope the paint is completely dry.
sentences.chinese: 四幅大型畫冊靜物，畫於今年，希望它們已經乾透了。

sentences.english: The straws are as dry as a bone.
The road parched up with dry weather.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥的天氣使道路乾透了。

sentences.english: Wood which is green is not dry enough to burn.
sentences.chinese: 發青的木柴沒有乾透，不好燒。

sentences.english: The contract stipulates for the use of seasoned timber.
sentences.chinese: 合同上訂明用乾透的木料。

sentences.english: Heavy covering will trap moisture and keep the onions from drying fully.
sentences.chinese: 蓋得太厚將積住溼氣，不利洋蔥乾透。

definition: water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
